name: Cardiovascular Risk Tools
description: Use when estimating cardiovascular risk, stroke risk in atrial fibrillation, bleeding risk, pneumonia severity (CURB-65), or venous thromboembolism probability (Wells DVT/PE). Includes ASCVD PCE, CHA2DS2-VASc, HAS-BLED, Framingham, HEART, CURB-65, and Wells scores.
